sent.orig: To the world you are somebody. but, to somebody you are the world.
sent.trans: 对于世界而言，你是一个平凡的人。但对于我而言，你就是全世界。

sent.orig: Somebody asked whether somebody could kill Anakin's best friend, so that he really gets angry.
sent.trans: 甚至有人问，是否能让某人杀了阿纳金最好的朋友，以便让他真正变得愤怒。

sent.orig: Because the senior officer is concerned that somebody might be listening. Well, somebody was.
sent.trans: 因为这个高级军官考虑到可能通话被窃听。

sent.orig: Maybe music is that somebody like it, and somebody hate it.
sent.trans: 也许这就是音乐，有人喜欢，有人讨厌。

sent.orig: I cannot make somebody like me anymore than somebody can get me to like them.
sent.trans: 我不能强求别人喜欢我，正如别人也不能强求我喜欢他。
